title: Common Entity Certificate
description: EVGI - This is a common structure that wraps EID. EC's are extensible to accommodate addtional fields

PubKey.title: Actor
PubKey.description: The public key that is used to communicate with this EID

RevURI.title: Revocation URI
RevURI.description: Revocation URI used for keeping track of all revocation certificate.

ALURI.title: Allow List URI
ALURI.description: Allow List URI used for keeping track of all Allow List certificates

BLURI.title: Block List URI
BLURI.description: Block List URI used for keeping track of all Block List certificates

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: Cryptographic scheme that was used to sign this certificate

HashAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
HashAlgo.description: Cryptographic scheme that was used to sign this certificate

Expiration.title: Expiration
Expiration.description: A timestamp for when this certificate expires

Issuer.title: Issuer
Issuer.description: The root EID that issued or approved this certificate

IssuerSig.title: Issuer Signature
IssuerSig.description: Signature from the above provisioner on the hash of rest of the certificate
